projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React (fork from mayankagarwal09)
 -  Fully customizable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: (WIP) Steam-Connect
projects.bodyText:
- NodeJS-Application which connects to your steam account via official API
 - Tracks reached/open achievements
 - downloads artworks for games using SteamGridDB
 - **currently work in progress (nothing to share yet)**

projects.title: letterBoxD ReactApp
projects.bodyText:
- FERN-Stack (FaunaDB, Express, React, NodeJS)
 - uses the rss-Feed of letterbox.com to get latest watched movies of users
 - transforms to a Rest-API (and saves searches to the FaunaDB)
 - WebApp (React + NextUI) let's you search user and shows their movie-history
 - hosted on Azure
 - **still work in progress**
